'''The Humminbird Bicycle Company Limited''', doing business as '''Humminbird Bike''', is a bicycle manufacturer from [[United Kingdom]] that designs particularly lightweight folding bikes. Weighing only 6.9kg, their <em>single speed models</em> are <em>the world's lightest folding bikes</em>, as of October 2024, while featuring a fold time of approximately 5 seconds. With their [https://prodrivefoldingbike.com/products/electric Hummingbird Electric] bike they won the [https://www.productdesignaward.eu European Product Design Award] in <em>Silver in Outdoor and Exercise Equipment/Bicycle and bicycle accessories</em> in 2019.<ref>{{Cite web
